name: DIECE
description:
After a life time of servitude to the human race, the moment of revenge has finally come.   The idea is that you are a worshipped DICE, who has decided to turn on the human race.  

Our stretch goal of the jam for us was to try and complete a playable game in under 2 hours. 

Destroy 1,000 humans as a dice!

Controls:

  • Arrow keys - Direction
  • Space bar - Charge your dice power
